messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] dinosaur website
messages.msgSnippet: Thankyou so much for this link.  My three year old (who just had a dino b-day party a few weeks ago) knows about twenty dinosaurs by name and classification,
messages.messageBody:
Thankyou so much for this link. My three year old (who just had a dino b-day party a few weeks ago) knows about twenty dinosaurs by name and classification, etc. and talks about them, plays with them, looks at Dino books all day some days. It's wild. It's been about a year of this intense interest; I'll be sad when it starts to die out :) Thanks again, Madeline

Jon and Rue Kream <skreams@...> wrote:I came across this website, and I know there are some parents of dinosaur
lovers on this list, so I thought I'd pass it on :0). ~Rue
http://www.rain.org/~philfear/download-a-dinosaur.html
